data.message:
Wow! Called the haters out. Reminds me of 8 mile where he says all the disses before you can. Absolutely correct and I️ think he’s right about having to listen to the negativity on the internet. It’s out of control and everyone thinks their opinions are solid.

If you’re here to just bash his music, your life is pretty aimless. Go do the things you love and listen to the artists you like. If you keep visiting an artist you don’t, it’s no wonder you’re so negative

Realest rhymes he’s ever made:
“Every CD critics gave it a 3 then three
Years later they go back and re-rate it
Then called The Slim Shady LP the greatest
The Marshall Mathers was a classic
The Eminem Show was fantastic
But Encore just didn't have the caliber to match it
I guess enough time just ain't passed yet
A couple more years, that shit'll be Illmatic.”

Look at recovery! 300 week’s on the top billboard after everyone complained! The expectations are so high that we devalue his work because we expected better. Just let him change as an artist and enjoy the old music if you can’t enjoy his new work.

replies.message:
You absolutely nailed it...🙌🙌
P.s. I think walk on water was spot on
And also he gave us a hint that he is godlike when he holds the mike and would be back again with a bang
But he dissed Trump and pussies are still mad at Beyonce for the half time show. Has nothing to do with quality of music. IMHO. Em is one of the dopest by the way...

I loved recovery. I thought his flow was immense. I love the new song too. #walkonwater is humble raw talent..Rapping acapella over a piano is beautiful. His lyrics are so humble and meaningful 💙 #shadytillidie #eminem
Shubh Guru he is saying he is human like us all if you listen to the lyrics pal 😊

Yeah Recovery is one of less than 20 album to EVER last more than 300 weeks. Clearly it is loved and continues to be loved by new people. The internet just gives hates a voice that isn't true. He owns 3 of the less than 20 albums and they aren't SSLP or MMLP
James Coronado  really? Lol... Trump is washed up
Its not being haters. He called out a whole group of people and dissed them for simply having a different opinion.
